DOC.brief_summary: Investigators hypothesize time caffeine administration either prophylaxis treatment apnea prematurity affect apnea response caffeine
DOC.brief_title: Prophylactic Versus Therapeutic Caffeine Apnea Prematurity
DOC.detailed_description: It randomize control trial , patient randomly assign receive caffeine load dose 20 mg/kg ( equivalent 10 mg/kg caffeine base ) maintenance dose 10 mg/kg/day ( equivalent 5 mg/kg caffeine base ) either prophylaxis group ( 1 ) therapeutic group ( 2 ) . Prophylactic caffeine ( group 1 ) define caffeine prescribed preterm infant within first 72 hour life prior manifest apnea , therapeutic caffeine ( group 2 ) define caffeine prescribe manifest apnea within first 72 hour life . Preparation administration caffeine perform Neonatal intensive care unit ( NICU ) nurse . Statistical Evaluation : Statistical analysis perform Statistical Package Social Sciences-SPSS version 16 software ( SPSS Inc , Chicago , Illinois ) . For categorical variable , X2 test use . For group comparison , Student T test use normal distribution Mann-Whitney U test use case abnormal distribution . For repeat measurement , variance analysis Friedman variance analysis use . For descriptive statistic , percent , minimum-maximum-median , mean , standard deviation use accordance type distribution variable . A P value < .05 consider statistically significant . Informed consent obtain parent , study approve local ethical committee .
DOC.criteria: Infants eligible study newborn infant â‰¤ 32 week without diagnosis apnea . Newborn infant gestational age > 32 week . Newborn infant congenital malformation chromosomal anomaly . Newborn infant apnea cause .
